text: RT @prashantrao: What do the country's great dynasties reveal about how modern Chinese leaders may wield their power? Look to their policies and practices, @MichaelSchuman writes: https://t.co/J9XlY0XIkh

name: TheAtlantic
text: Asking whether the celebration of Amy Coney Barrett's nomination was a "super-spreader" event misses the point: Trump's irresponsibility made this crisis likely, @olgakhazan and @russellberman write: https://t.co/NKkwg3ZCvc
